data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a throw-in for Elfsborg, close to Varbergs's area.
In the minute 2, Elfsborg to take a throw-in in Varbergs territory.
Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Varbergs at Borås Arena.
Throw-in Elfsborg.
Throw-in high up the field for Elfsborg in Boras.
In the minute 6, Free kick Elfsborg.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Boras.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Varbergs in their own half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Tashreeq Matthews.
Daniel Krezic with an assist there.
In the minute 10, Varbergs awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Varbergs throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
Elfsborg advance rapidly upfield but Mohammed Al-Hakim blows for offside.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Varbergs at Borås Arena.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
Elfsborg needs to be cautious. Varbergs have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, Varbergs push upfield but Mohammed Al-Hakim quickly pulls them for offside.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
Varbergs's Albert Ejupi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 20, Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Varbergs.
Throw-in for Varbergs close to the penalty box.
In the minute 23, Varbergs have a goal kick.
Free kick for Varbergs in the half of Elfsborg.
Varbergs pushes forward through Adama Fofana, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 26, Gustaf Norlin of Varbergs smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the away team a throw-in.
Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 27, In Boras, Per Frick (Elfsborg) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
Ball safe as Elfsborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Elfsborg.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
In Boras Varbergs drive forward through Daniel Krezic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 29, Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Boras.
In the minute 33, Elfsborg have been given a penalty...
Goal! The home team are now level through a Jesper Karlsson penalty.
Goal kick for Varbergs at Borås Arena.
In the minute 35, Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Varbergs's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Elfsborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Varbergs's half?
In the minute 38, Gustaf Norlin (Varbergs) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
Varbergs push forward at Borås Arena and Gustaf Norlin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Elfsborg defence.
In the minute 41, Tashreeq Matthews (Varbergs) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Daniel Krezic (Varbergs) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Varbergs.
Free kick for Varbergs in the half of Elfsborg.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Elfsborg's Robert Gojani has been booked in Boras.
The second half has started at Borås Arena.
Elfsborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, At Borås Arena, Varbergs are penalized for being offside.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the away team a throw-in.
Samuel Holmen is on a sub for Simon Olsson for Elfsborg.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a throw-in for Elfsborg, close to Varbergs's area.
In the minute 48, Rami Kaib is replacing Simon Strand for Elfsborg at Borås Arena.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
In the minute 50, Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Varbergs just outside Elfsborg's area.
Varbergs surge into the attack at Borås Arena but Anton Liljenback’s header is off-target.
In the minute 51, Elfsborg have a goal kick.
Anton Liljenback is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Per Frick for Elfsborg drives towards goal at Borås Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 53, Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Elfsborg attack but Leo Vaisanen's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Varbergs at Borås Arena.
Varbergs's Anton Liljenback is back in action after a slight knock.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
In the minute 55, Throw-in high up the field for Elfsborg in Boras.
Elfsborg are pushing forward but Per Frick's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
In the minute 58, Elfsborg are coming forward and Per Frick gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Boras.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 59, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Elfsborg throw-in in Varbergs's half.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Varbergs have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Astrit Seljmani (Varbergs) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 62, Varbergs drive upfield and Albert Ejupi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Elfsborg defender.
Can Varbergs capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elfsborg's half?
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Varbergs.
Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Varbergs's half?
The home team have replaced Robert Gojani with Frederik Holst. This is the third substitution made today by Jimmy Thelin.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Varbergs at Borås Arena.
Throw-in for Elfsborg close to the penalty box.
Jesper Karlsson (Elfsborg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Varbergs at Borås Arena.
Rasmus Alm scores to make it 2-1 at Borås Arena.
Jesper Karlsson instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Varbergs have a dangerous throw-in.
Erion Sadiku gets an equalizer for Varbergs. The score is now 2-2.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
Jesper Karlsson puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
Throw-in Varbergs.
In the minute 76, Varbergs have a goal kick.
Elfsborg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Varbergs to take a throw-in in Elfsborg territory.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Elfsborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Varbergs close to the penalty box.
The away team replace Tashreeq Matthews with Keanin Ayer.
In the minute 80, Joakim Persson (Varbergs) is making a second substitution, with Alexander Johansson replacing Luke Le Roux.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
The match at Borås Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Gustav Henriksson, who is down injured.
In the minute 85, Varbergs needs to be cautious. Elfsborg have an attacking throw-in.
Elfsborg's Gustav Henriksson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 86, Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
Jimmy Thelin is making the team's fourth substitution at Borås Arena with Marokhy Ndione replacing Jesper Karlsson.
Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joakim Persson (Varbergs) is making a third substitution, with Albin Winbo replacing Hampus Zackrisson.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Boras.
Free kick Varbergs.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Varbergs in their own half.
Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a throw-in for Varbergs, close to Elfsborg's area.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-3.
Albert Ejupi (Varbergs) gets a yellow card.
August Stromberg (Varbergs) levels the match at 3-3 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Albin Winbo.
